title: Sri-Kumar: Real growth cannot come from monetary policy alone
itunes:title: Sri-Kumar: Real growth cannot come from monetary policy alone
description:
Sri-Kumar Global Strategies' Komal Sri-Kumar sits down to discuss global growth on Bloomberg Surveillance with Tom Keene and Michael McKee.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
